title: Easy a la King
directions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine the chicken, milk, soup, water, spinach or broccoli, mushrooms, hot pepper sauce and salt and pepper to taste. Cook, stirring, for about 10 to 15 minutes or until heated through. Serve over cooked egg noodles, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
